#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define rep(i,n) for( int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define  s(t) scanf("%d",&t)
#define p(x) printf("%d\n",x)
typedef long long ll;

using namespace std;
int main(){
    int t;
    s(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        string a,b;
         cin>>a>>b;
          sort(a.begin(),a.end());
          sort(b.begin(),b.end());
          if(a==b)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
          else cout<<"NO"<<endl;}}
